-Mk6A3hTOTgHQExMkB9Z.content:
What is No Claim Bonus in Car Insurance?

Posted on March 11, 2021Author policyblog

No Claim Bonus:

Are you a safe driver? What if you are told that you will be rewarded for having a safe pair of hands? A No Claim Bonus does just that! You can benefit from being a safe driver and not making a claim when you renew your insurance policy by taking advantage of a clause known as the No Claim Bonus. The clause has been designed to reward and encourage drivers to be safe on roads. If you have not claimed insurance for damages to your vehicle or to self in the preceding year, you are eligible for a No Claim Bonus the subsequent year. The greater the number of years where one hasn’t claimed insurance, the higher the discount offered. Will explain about this in further detail in the following paragraphs. A higher discount on account of “No Claims” makes your Car Insurance Policy more affordable.

The No Claim Bonus is a win-win mechanism for both the insurer and the insured. The insurer benefits from not having to pay during the period insured for. Some of that benefit gets passed on to the insured by way of a No Claim Bonus. With a No Claim Bonus, the insured has an indicative reference around what will be his/her premium amount the following year. For example, you own a hatchback car which is five years old. You haven’t claimed insurance in the preceding five years. In this case, you are eligible for a discount of 45% on the premium. While the discount available is fairly standardized across insurers, it is subject to review and change. Therefore, it is important to understand this aspect before finalizing on your policy purchase and the insurer from whom you purchase the policy. Generally, the discount slabs are as follows: 20% for the second year, 25% for the third year, 35% for the fourth year, 45% for the fifth year and 50% for the sixth year. The saving potential stands at a minimum of Rs.2,400 (at 20%) to a maximum of Rs.6,000 (at 50%) on a premium of Rs.12,000 for a car insurance plan. The No Claim Bonus can be carried forward provided the policy is renewed within 90 days of the expiry date. A No Claim Bonus is applicable only to the “own damage” part of the premium. This translates to 80% of the policy premium. The premium for third-party damage constitutes the remaining 20%.

Termination of No Claim Bonus:

Your No Claim Bonus stands invalid under the following primary conditions (besides others as specified by your insurer):

i. If you have made a claim during the preceding year, you cannot claim a No Claim Bonus in the current year. Similarly, you cannot claim a No Claim Bonus the subsequent year, if you have already claimed insurance in the current year.

ii. You cannot avail a No Claim Bonus for a lapsed policy. So it is important to ensure you renew your auto insurance plan within the stipulated time frame. In most instances, companies provide a 90 day window for auto insurance renewal of existing policy.

Tips for No Claim Bonus:

Here are a few suggestions you might want to consider while utilizing your No Claim Bonus:

  1. No Claim Bonus Transfer: A No Claim Bonus can be transferred from one vehicle to another provided the policyholder is the same. This is because the No Claims feature is linked to the insured and not the vehicle. However, please note that the vehicle type has to be the same. If you currently have two-wheeler insurance and you have purchased a new hatchback car, the No Claim Bonus you have earned for your two-wheeler cannot be availed for your new car.
  2. You can not only transfer your No Claim Bonus from vehicle to vehicle but from insurer to insurer. In order to transfer your No Claim Bonus discount from your old insurer to your new insurer, you will have to follow the procedures as listed by your current insurer.
  3. In some cases, it may be prudent not to claim insurance if the cost of repair is estimated to be lower than the No Claim Bonus discount you will be eligible for in the following year.
  4. Many insurers offer a No Claim Bonus exclusively for customers that purchase auto insurance online. Do background research if this is the case with the insurer you intend to purchase your auto policy from and also evaluate the discount slabs and premium outgo before you decide on your Car Insurance Policy. Compare wisely!
-Mk6A3hTOTgHQExMkB9Z.heading: What is No Claim Bonus in Car Insurance?

-Mk6Ampi4LMCWYngW0w_.content:
5 Steps to get a Better Car Insurance Deal

Posted on February 18, 2021Author policyBoss  0

Generally, two in five of car insurance policyholders think about changing a policy or an insurance service provider when policy renewal time arrives. You can easily save some handsome amount of money only if you compare online motor insurance quotes. Below are few simple steps to get a better deal on vehicle insurance online:

Look for the Best Cover, Not for the Low Cost

While comparing online quotes, people should be clear in mind that you are searching for the best plan and not just looking for the least expensive policy. Online comparison is the best way to get the best rate for the right plan that meets your needs. It shows which insurance products include extras. But, opt for the policy that gives high level of protection which you actually require.

Never Increase the Excess:

Growing your excess may make a car insurance policy affordable, but it can be risky. Hence, do not increase the excess to an amount insured would struggle to pay in the future.

Check Around Other Insurance Companies in India:

As not all insurance companies in India list their names on quotes comparison websites, so customers won’t be able to compare their products in single go. It can be worth getting a car insurance quote from their website directly.

Add Someone to the Plan:

Including an additional driver especially a more experienced one to your vehicle insurance policy can surely bring the coverage cost down. But, do not mention him as the main driving person in a plan.

Stay Away From Assumptions, Be Sure!

When a person is comparing online car insurance quotes offered by different insurance companies in India, he or she will definitely make some assumptions. But, it’s totally depending on you to make sure these assumptions are right. Carefully read the policy document so that you’re very much clear on what assumptions have been made.
-Mk6Ampi4LMCWYngW0w_.heading: 5 Steps to get a Better Car Insurance Deal

Check your Voter ID online application status

 
  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  

You have applied for your id and are you curious as to what happened to the application? You can check the status of your application online by providing the request id which was given to upon completion of your online application.

Check you status with the request id by following the below steps.

  1. Visit the check status page.
  2. Enter the request id in the box stating “Enter reference id”. After entering the id press TRACK STATUS.
  3. The status of your application will be shown.

-Mk6BHzAIncWo2_ZV81y.content:
How to apply Voter ID card online

 
  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  

To participate in the selection of our leader of the state, voter id is a must. Once turning 18 years of age, all individuals desire for voter id so that they can be part of something great such as the selection of the leader. What are the necessary documents needed for online application so as to get a voter card?

The documents required will be a scanned copy of

  1. Address proof – any one of the following document:
    1. Bank / Kisan / Post Office current Pass Book ; or
    2. Ration Card ; or
    3. Passport ; or
    4. Driving License ; or
    5. Income Tax Assessment Order ; or
    6. Latest rent agreement ; or
    7. Latest Water / Telephone / Electricity / Gas Connection Bill for that address, either in the name of the applicant or that of his / her immediate relation like parents etc. ; or
    8. Any post / letter / mail delivered through Indian Postal Department in the applicant’s name
  2. Identity proof and Proof of DOB
    1. Birth certificate issued by a Municipal Authorities or district office of the Registrar of Births &
    2. Deaths or Baptism certificate ; or
    3. Birth certificate from the school (Govt. / Recognized) last attended by the applicant or any other recognized educational institution ; or
    4. If a person in class 10 or more pass, he should give a copy of the marksheet of class 10, if it contains date of birth as a proof of date of birth ; or
    5. Marksheet of class 8 if it contains date of birth ; or
    6. Marksheet of class 5 if it contains date of birth ; or
    7. Indian Passport ; or
    8. PAN card ; or
    9. Driving License ; or
    10. Aadhar letter issued by UIDAI.
  3. A scanned copy of your signature and photo.

Why do we require these? To decide the Assembly constituency based on your submission of proof of Address to the election commission. Follow the steps below to apply voter id online.

Step 1:

Keep the above mentioned documents ready as a scanned copy in your computer. The image of you should not be more than 40kb in size.

Step 2:

Click here to visit FORM 6 portal where you will be filling the following details:

  1. Select your state and Assembly constituency.
  2. Application Details:
    1. Name
    2. Surname
    3. Age or DOB

Place of birth details:

  1. Born in India: Select yes or no.
  2. State: Select your state you were born
  3. District: District you were born
  4. Village/ Town: The village you were born
  5. Father’s/ Mother’s name
  6. Father’s/ Mother’s surname
  7. Relationship (Father or mother)

  1. Address details: The following details will be asked.
    1. District: The district at which you are currently present
    2. House/ Door number:
    3. House/ Flat name:
    4. Street/ Road / Area/ locality
    5. Village/ Town
    6. Post office
    7. Pincode
    8. Tehsil/Taluka/ Mandal/Thana
    9. Select district
    10. Mobile number and
    11. Email Id
  1. Details of other members: This is optional.
  2. Upload documents: Here you need the upload the scanned copy of the following documents
    1. Photograph: Maximum size should be of 40Kb.
    2. Address Proof: Aadhaar card/ Passport/ Ration card/ Drivers license
    3. Age proof: Passport/ 10th certificate/ Birth certificate
  3. Declaration: You need to give the date from when you started living in the house. Enter the verification code and press NEXT.

After pressing SUBMIT and you will be asked to confirm the details you have entered. Double check the details entered and if everything is correct then Press CONFIRM or to change the details entered press EDIT.

Once confirmed you will be given an Application number as shown below. Note this for future reference for tracking your application status.
-Mk6BHzAIncWo2_ZV81y.heading: How to apply Voter ID card online

-Mk6BfajC4wRdR68obm2.content:
TATA Steel Recruitment 2021 for Trade Apprentice – Apply Now

by Jebi Mariam
 
 August 23, 2021
 
in Articles, Notifications, Other Government Exam
 
 
 
Share on FacebookShare on WhatsAppShare on Telegram
 
 

Table of Contents

TATA Steel Limited is inviting online applications from Freshers/ Employee Wards and Registered Relations of Tata Steel Bearings Division for recruitment of freshers/ experienced AITT Pass (NAC) for Bearings Division, Kharagpur for the posts like Apprentice and other vacancies. Candidates those who are eligible for the post can apply till 14th February 2021. The procedure via online mode only. Check out the article TATA Steel Recruitment 2021: Apply for Apprentice and other Vacancies for more details like eligibility criteria, selection, salary, etc.

TATA Steel Recruitment 2021: Apply for Apprentice and other Vacancies

TATA Steel has released the recruitment notification for the posts like Apprentice and other vacancies. The last date to submit online application is 14th February 2021. Applicants must posses All India Trade Test for Apprentices Pass (National Apprenticeship Certificate) from NCVT in Trades of Fitter/ Machinist/Electrician as minimum qualification. The candidates will be selected through Online/Written examination followed by an Interview and Medical Examination.

TATA Steel Recruitment 2021
Organization Name TATA Steel Limited
Name of the posts Apprentice and other vacancies
Advertisement Number Ref. No. Brgs/HRM/64/21
Ref. No. Brgs/HRM/65/21
Ref. No. Brgs/HRM/66/21
Ref. No. Brgs/HRM/67/21
Job Location Bearings Division, Kharagpur
Last Date for Submission of application  14.02.2021
Official Website www.tatasteel.com

Download the official notification of TATA Steel Recruitment 2021

Eligibility Criteria for TATA Steel Recruitment 2021

Minimum Educational Qualification

  • All India Trade Test for Apprentices Pass (National Apprenticeship Certificate) from NCVT in Trades of
    Fitter/ Machinist/Electrician.

Mandatory Experience

  • Minimum three (3) years of work experience as on Feb 1, 2021 after passing All India Trade Test for
    Apprentices.
  • Minimum two (2) years of work experience as on Feb 1, 2021 after passing All India Trade Test for Apprentices, only for candidates who have successfully completed Apprenticeship Training from Tata Steel –Bearings Division.

Attempt Free Mock Tests and Daily Quizzes on Entri app!

Age Limit

  • The applicant should have been born between 1st Feb 1989 & 1st Feb 2003 for General candidates.
  • The applicant should have been born between 1st Feb 1986 & 1st Feb 2003 for SC/ ST Candidates.

Selection Process

TATA Steel Recruitment will select candidates on the basis of Online/Written Test followed by an Interview and Medical examination. And after that, the short list will be published on the official website. Finally they will be appointed.

Steps to Apply TATA Steel Recruitment 2021

The interested and eligible candidates can apply through online mode only.

  • Visit the official website tatasteel.com.
  • Select the “Career” option, find the advertisements.
  • Download the Advertisement and read it carefully.
  • Then click on the apply link option.
  • Fill up all the details in the Application Form for Recruitment of AITT Pass- Bearings Kharagpur
  • Enter your details correctly and recheck again.
  • Finally click submit button.
  • Save the application form for future reference.
-Mk6BfajC4wRdR68obm2.heading: TATA Steel Recruitment 2021 for Trade Apprentice – Apply Now
